schema.name: permit_num
schema.label: Permit Num
schema.description: Last two digits of calendar year, plus IBMS-generated sequence

schema.name: revision_num
schema.label: Revision Num
schema.description: Two digit number identifying revisions to permit application made after permit issuance

schema.name: permit_type
schema.label: Permit Type
schema.description: Text field describing the type of permit.

schema.name: structure_type
schema.label: Structure Type
schema.description: Identifies that type of structure the application relates to.

schema.name: work
schema.label: Work
schema.description: Overall description of the type of work covered by application.

schema.name: street_num
schema.label: Street Num
schema.description: Address – street number

schema.name: street_name
schema.label: Street Name
schema.description: Address – street name

schema.name: street_type
schema.label: Street Type
schema.description: Address – street type

schema.name: street_direction
schema.label: Street Direction
schema.description: Address – street direction

schema.name: postal
schema.label: Postal
schema.description: First 3 digits of postal code

schema.name: geo_id
schema.label: Geo Id
schema.description: City-defined, unique identifier for Property Address

schema.name: application_date
schema.label: Application Date
schema.description: Date that the application was received and entered into IBMS

schema.name: issued_date
schema.label: Issued Date
schema.description: Date that the permit was issued.

schema.name: completed_date
schema.label: Completed Date
schema.description: Date work is complete and permit is cleared

schema.name: status
schema.label: Status
schema.description: Current status of application / permit

schema.name: description
schema.label: Description
schema.description: Description of work proposed in application

schema.name: current use
schema.label: Current Use
schema.description: Use of the property at the time of application submission

schema.name: proposed_use
schema.label: Proposed Use
schema.description: Use of the property after completion of work covered by permit

schema.name: dwelling_units_created
schema.label: Dwelling Units Created
schema.description: Number of residential dwelling units created by completion of permit work.

schema.name: dwelling_units_lost
schema.label: Dwelling Units Lost
schema.description: Number of residential dwelling units lost by completion of permit work.

schema.name: assembly
schema.label: Assembly
schema.description: Assembly Occupancy area (in sq metres) covered by permit work. (eg Restaurant, Library, Theatre)

schema.name: institutional
schema.label: Institutional
schema.description: Institutional Occupancy area (in sq metres) covered by permit work (eg Hospital, Nursing Home)

schema.name: residential
schema.label: Residential
schema.description: Residential Occupancy area (in sq metres) covered by permit work

schema.name: business_and_personal_services
schema.label: Business And Personal Services
schema.description: Business and Personal Services Occupancy area (in sq metres) covered by permit work (Office, Bank, Medical Clinic)

schema.name: mercantile
schema.label: Mercantile
schema.description: Mercantile Occupancy area (in sq metres) covered by permit work (eg Department Store, Supermarket)

schema.name: industrial
schema.label: Industrial
schema.description: Industrial Occupancy area (in sq metres) covered by permit work (eg Warehouse, Gas Station)

schema.name: interior alterations
schema.label: Interior Alterations
schema.description: Floor area (in sq metres) covered by permit work

schema.name: demolition
schema.label: Demolition
schema.description: Floor area (in sq metres) covered by permit work
